participant_1.background:
I love the sound of a classic car engine, it's like music to my ears.
I sometimes play video games for hours on end, even though I know I should be doing something more productive.
i am highly educated.
my favorite drink is chocolate milk.
i am twenty five years old.

participant_2.background:
I go for a walk with my dogs every day.
I'm a bit of a klutz, but I always try to be careful around my pets.
I am not very fashionable but I do like to wear nice clothes on special occasions.
I've been working at my current job for three years, and I'm really happy here.
My parents are not tech-savvy, but they are very supportive of my interests.

content.text: Hey, my name is participant_1. How are you doing today?
I'm doing well, thanks for asking! My name is participant_2.
Nice to meet you, participant_1. What do you like to do for fun?
I like to go for walks with my dogs, watch movies, and play video games.
I like to go for walks with my dogs too! What kind of dogs do you have?
I have a golden retriever and a black lab.
Those are both great breeds! I love dogs.
Me too! They're the best companions.
What do you do for work?
I'm a software engineer. I've been working at my current job for three years, and I really like it.
That's great! I'm a student right now. I'm studying computer science.
Oh, that's awesome! What year are you in?
Nice! What are you interested in specializing in?
I'm not sure yet. I'm still exploring my options.
That's okay. You have plenty of time to figure it out.
